cause.description:
Write letters or send e-mails to Bishop Carroll in support of Mr. Keiser and encourage your friends to do the same!
Administration 8101 W. Central Wichita, KS 67212
Leticia Nielsen President/Principal nielsenleticia@bcchs.org
Slade LaMunyon Assistant Principal lamunyonslade@bcchs.org
Alan Schuckman Assistant Principal schuckmanalan@bcchs.org
Fr. Jarrod Lies frjlies@bcchs.org
Hey,you could even find one of their home addresses and bombard them with letters there. I don't care, just safe Mr. Keiser!
I ALSO THINK IT'D BE REALLY NICE TO SEND MR. KEISER THANK YOU LETTERS!
I had to pick a nonprofit organization so I went with Catholic Charities.
1. Mr. Keiser is an excellent teacher.
2. He was fired on false premises.
3. I cannot, in good conscience, support Bishop Carroll's lowering academic standards!
cause.mission: Bring Bishop Carroll back into decency and have Mr. Keiser reinstated!
cause.name: Save Mr. Kesier!
